trans-unit.source: If position is absolute, the bottom property specifies the subcontrol's bottom edge in relation to the parent's bottom edge (see also subcontrol-origin).

trans-unit.source: If position is absolute, the left property specifies the subcontrol's left edge in relation to the parent's left edge (see also subcontrol-origin).

trans-unit.source: If position is absolute, the right property specifies the subcontrol's right edge in relation to the parent's right edge (see also subcontrol-origin).

trans-unit.source: If position is absolute, the top property specifies the subcontrol's top edge in relation to the parent's top edge (see also subcontrol-origin).

trans-unit.source: If position is relative (the default), moves a subcontrol by a certain offset down.

trans-unit.source: If position is relative (the default), moves a subcontrol by a certain offset to the left; specifying right: x is then equivalent to specifying left: -x.
trans-unit.target: 如果position是 relative （默认值），则将子控件向左移动一定的偏移量；否则，向右移动。指定 right: x 等效于指定 left: -x 。

trans-unit.source: If position is relative (the default), moves a subcontrol by a certain offset to the right.

trans-unit.source: If position is relative (the default), moves a subcontrol by a certain offset up; specifying bottom: y is then equivalent to specifying top: -y.

If spontaneous() is true, the event originated outside the application. In this case, the user hid the window using the window manager controls, either by iconifying the window or by switching to another virtual desktop where the window is not visible. The window will become hidden but not withdrawn. If the window was iconified, QWidget::isMinimized() returns true.
trans-unit.target: 如果自发（）为true，则事件起源于应用程序之外。在这种情况下，用户可以使用窗口管理器控件来隐藏窗口，方法是使窗口图标化或切换到其他不可见窗口的虚拟桌面。窗口将被隐藏，但不会撤回。如果窗口已图标化，则QWidget :: isMinimized（）返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: If type() is ActionAdded, returns the action that should appear before action(). If this function returns nullptr, the action should be appended to already existing actions on the same widget.
trans-unit.target: 如果type（）为ActionAdded，则返回应该在action（）之前出现的操作。如果此函数返回 nullptr ，则应将操作附加到同一小部件​​上已经存在的操作上。

trans-unit.source: If startUpdates() has been called, this signal will be emitted if this QGeoPositionInfoSource subclass determines that it will not be able to provide further regular updates. This signal will not be emitted again until after the regular updates resume.
trans-unit.target: 如果已调用startUpdates（），则当此QGeoPositionInfoSource子类确定其将无法提供进一步的常规更新时，将发出此信号。在常规更新恢复之前，不会再次发出该信号。

trans-unit.source: If startUpdates() or requestUpdate() is called, this signal is emitted when an update becomes available.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用startUpdates（）或requestUpdate（），则在有可用更新时会发出此信号。

trans-unit.source: If setUpdateInterval() has not been called, the source will emit updates as soon as they become available.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未调用setUpdateInterval（），则源将在更新可用后立即发出更新。

trans-unit.source: If error() equals QGeoRouteReply::NoError then the processing finished successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果error（）等于QGeoRouteReply :: NoError，则处理成功完成。

If primaryOrientation == orientation, it means that the screen automatically rotates all content which is displayed, depending on how you hold it. But if orientation changes while primaryOrientation does NOT change, then probably you are using a device which does not rotate its own display. In that case you may need to use Item.rotation or Item.transform to rotate your content.
trans-unit.target: 如果primaryOrientation == orientation，则表示屏幕将根据您的握持方式自动旋转显示的所有内容。但是，如果方向变化而primaryOrientation不变，则可能您使用的设备不会旋转其自己的显示器。在这种情况下，您可能需要使用Item.rotation或Item.transform来旋转内容。

trans-unit.target: 如果QSsl :: SslOptionDisableSessionPersistence已关闭，则此函数以ASN.1格式返回SSL握手中使用的会话票证，例如适合保留到磁盘。如果未使用任何会话票证或未关闭QSsl :: SslOptionDisableSessionPersistence，则此函数返回一个空的QByteArray。

trans-unit.source: If position is absolute, the bottom property specifies the subcontrol's bottom edge in relation to the parent's bottom edge (see also subcontrol-origin).

If position is absolute, the right property specifies the subcontrol's right edge in relation to the parent's right edge (see also subcontrol-origin).
If position is absolute, the top property specifies the subcontrol's top edge in relation to the parent's top edge (see also subcontrol-origin).
If position is relative (the default), moves a subcontrol by a certain offset down.
If position is relative (the default), moves a subcontrol by a certain offset to the left; specifying right: x is then equivalent to specifying left: -x.
If position is relative (the default), moves a subcontrol by a certain offset to the right.
If position is relative (the default), moves a subcontrol by a certain offset up; specifying bottom: y is then equivalent to specifying top: -y.

trans-unit.target: 如果 cookbook.xml 的加载没有错误， <oppskrift> 为食谱中的每个 <recipe> 元素构造一个<oppskrift>元素（挪威语为食谱），并将 <recipe> 的子节点复制到 <oppskrift> 元素中。但是，如果食谱文档不存在或不包含格式正确的XML，则会构造一个包含错误消息的单个 <oppskrift> 元素。

trans-unit.source: If testFuture gets canceled, its state is propagated to the next then(), which will be also canceled. So in this case Block 6 will be called.

If testFuture is successfully fulfilled Block 1 will be called. If it succeeds as well, the next then() (Block 4) is called. If testFuture gets canceled or fails with an exception, either Block 2 or Block 3 will be called respectively. The next then() will be called afterwards, and the story repeats.

trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则QAbstract3DGraph :: selectionMode必须将QAbstract3DGraph :: SelectionRow或QAbstract3DGraph :: SelectionColumn设置为有效选择。

trans-unit.source: If true, axes will be updated anytime they change regardless of whether any mouse button is being pressed. Otherwise, axes are updated only when one of the mouse buttons is being pressed.

If true, axis titles in the primary graph view will be rotated towards the camera similarly to the axis labels. If false, axis titles are only rotated around their axis but are not otherwise oriented towards the camera. This property does not have any effect if the labelAutoRotation property value is zero. Default value is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则主图视图中的轴标题将与轴标签类似地朝摄像机旋转。如果为 false ，则轴标题仅绕其轴旋转，否则不朝向摄像机。如果labelAutoRotation属性值为零，则此属性无效。默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If true, axis titles in the primary graph view will be rotated towards the camera similarly to the axis labels. If false, axis titles are only rotated around their axis but are not otherwise oriented towards the camera. This property does not have any effect if the labelAutoRotation property value is zero. Default value is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则主图视图中的轴标题将与轴标签类似地朝摄像机旋转。如果为 false ，则轴标题仅绕其轴旋转，否则不朝向摄像机。如果labelAutoRotation属性值为零，则此属性无效。默认值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If true, interpolation will occur between sprite frames to make the animation appear smoother.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将在子画面帧之间进行插值以使动画看起来更平滑。

trans-unit.source: If true, item labels are drawn as floating labels in the graph. Otherwise, item labels are not drawn. To show the item label in an external control, this property is set to false. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则项目标签将在图形中绘制为浮动标签。否则，将不会绘制项目标签。要在外部控件中显示项目标签，请将此属性设置为 false 。默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If true, orthographic projection will be used for displaying the graph. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将使用正交投影来显示图形。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, ortographic projection is used to create 2D graphs by replacing the default input handler with one that does not allow rotating the graph and by setting the camera to view the graph directly from the side or from the top. Also, axis labels typically need to be rotated when viewing the graph from the sides. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将正投影投影用于创建2D图形，方法是将默认输入处理程序替换为不允许旋转图形的默认输入处理程序，并设置照相机以直接从侧面或从顶部查看图形。另外，从侧面查看图形时，通常需要旋转轴标签。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, rendering is continuous and the value of the currentFps property is updated. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则呈现是连续的，并且currentFps属性的值将更新。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, smooth versions of predefined meshes set via the mesh property are used. This property does not affect custom meshes used when the mesh is set to Abstract3DSeries.MeshUserDefined. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则使用通过mesh属性设置的预定义网格的平滑版本。当网格设置为Abstract3DSeries.MeshUserDefined时，此属性不会影响使用的自定义网格。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, smooth versions set via the mesh property are used. This property does not affect custom meshes used when the mesh is set to MeshUserDefined. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则使用通过mesh属性设置的平滑版本。当网格设置为MeshUserDefined时，此属性不会影响使用的自定义网格。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the Y-rotation of the camera is wrapped from minimum to maximum and from maximum to minimum. If false, the Y-rotation of the camera is limited to the sector determined by the minimum and maximum values.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则摄像机的Y旋转将从最小值缠绕到最大值，也从最大值缠绕到最小值。如果为 false ，则摄像机的Y旋转将限制在由最小值和最大值确定的扇区。

trans-unit.source: If true, the Y-rotation of the camera is wrapped from minimum to maximum and from maximum to minimum. If false, the Y-rotation of the camera is limited to the sector determined by the minimum and maximum values. Set to true by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则摄像机的Y旋转将从最小值缠绕到最大值，也从最大值缠绕到最小值。如果为 false ，则摄像机的Y旋转将限制在由最小值和最大值确定的扇区。默认设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the animation will be played in reverse.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则动画将反向播放。

trans-unit.source: If true, the animation will have no duration. Instead, the animation will advance one frame each time a frame is rendered to the screen. This synchronizes it with the painting rate as opposed to elapsed time.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则动画将没有持续时间。取而代之的是，每次将一帧渲染到屏幕时，动画都会前进一帧。这使它与绘画速率（而不是经过的时间）同步。

trans-unit.source: If true, the axis will be rendered in reverse, i.e. the positions of minimum and maximum values are swapped when the graph is rendered. This property doesn't affect the actual minimum and maximum values of the axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则轴将反向渲染，即，在渲染图形时，将交换最小值和最大值的位置。该属性不会影响轴的实际最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: If true, the axis will be rendered in reverse. That is, the positions of the minimum and maximum values are swapped when the graph is rendered. This property does not affect the actual minimum and maximum values of the axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则轴将反向渲染。也就是说，在绘制图形时会交换最小值和最大值的位置。该属性不会影响轴的实际最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: If true, the horizontal axes are changed into polar axes. The x-axis becomes the angular axis and the z-axis becomes the radial axis. Polar mode is not available for bar graphs.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将水平轴更改为极轴。x轴成为角轴，z轴成为径向轴。极坐标模式不适用于条形图。

trans-unit.source: If true, the rendering is done continuously instead of on demand, and the value of the currentFps property is updated. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则呈现将连续进行而不是按需进行，并且currentFps属性的值将更新。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the value of 0.0 means that the bars are placed side-to-side, 1.0 means that a space as wide as the thickness of one bar is left between the bars, and so on. Preset to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则值 0.0 表示条形图并排放置，值 1.0 表示在条形图之间留有一个条形图的宽度，依此类推。预设为 true 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the x-axis becomes the angular axis and the z-axis becomes the radial axis. Polar mode is not available for bar graphs.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则x轴成为角轴，z轴成为径向轴。极坐标模式不适用于条形图。

trans-unit.source: If url.examples is not defined, QDoc will output a list of example's files and images instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果 url.examples ，则QDoc将改为输出示例文件和图像的列表。

trans-unit.source: If viewfinder.minimumFrameRate is equal to viewfinder.maximumFrameRate, the frame rate is fixed. If not, the actual frame rate fluctuates between the two values.
trans-unit.target: 如果 viewfinder.minimumFrameRate 等于 viewfinder.maximumFrameRate ，则帧速率是固定的。如果不是，则实际帧速率在两个值之间波动。

trans-unit.source: If OpenSSL is not found in the normal compiler include and library directories, you can set either the OPENSSL_PREFIX, or OPENSSL_INCDIR and OPENSSL_LIBDIR configure arguments. If OPENSSL_PREFIX is set, OPENSSL_INCDIR defaults to OPENSSL_PREFIX/include and OPENSSL_LIBDIR to OPENSSL_PREFIX/lib.
If QCamera::FocusPointAuto or QCamera::FocusPointFaceDetection focus mode is selected this method returns the list of zones the camera is actually focused on.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择了 QCamera::FocusPointAuto 或 QCamera::FocusPointFaceDetection 聚焦模式,本方法将返回摄像机实际聚焦的区域列表。

trans-unit.source: If QDoc encounters both exampledirs and examples, it will look first in the examples directory. QDoc will accept the first matching file it finds. QDoc will search in the directories specified, not in their subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 如果QDoc遇到 exampledirs 和 examples ，它将首先在 examples 目录中查找。QDoc将接受它找到的第一个匹配文件。QDoc将在指定的目录中搜索，而不是在其子目录中搜索。

trans-unit.source: If QDoc is generating HTML, it will translate these commands to:
If QObjects are created within QThread::run(), they cannot become children of the QThread object because the QThread does not live in the thread that calls QThread::run().
trans-unit.target: 如果在QThread :: run（）中创建QObject ，则它们不能成为QThread对象的子级，因为QThread不在调用QThread :: run（）的线程中。

trans-unit.source: If Qt Core is using the ICU libraries, they will be used to perform the transformation according to the rules of the current locale. Otherwise the conversion may be done in a platform-dependent manner, with QString::toLower() as a generic fallback.
trans-unit.target: 如果Qt Core使用ICU库，则将根据当前语言环境的规则使用它们执行转换。否则，可以使用QString :: toLower（）作为通用后备，以依赖于平台的方式完成转换。

trans-unit.source: If Qt Core is using the ICU libraries, they will be used to perform the transformation according to the rules of the current locale. Otherwise the conversion may be done in a platform-dependent manner, with QString::toUpper() as a generic fallback.
trans-unit.target: 如果Qt Core使用ICU库，则将根据当前语言环境的规则使用它们执行转换。否则，可以使用QString :: toUpper（）作为通用后备，以依赖于平台的方式完成转换。

trans-unit.source: If Qt Location has been built before Qt WebEngine then this feature can be tested by using Maps and allowing it to find the current position of the user. Note that on Windows an external GPS receiver must be connected to the application. For more information, see Qt Positioning.
trans-unit.target: 如果Qt Location是在Qt WebEngine之前构建的，则可以通过使用地图并允许其查找用户的当前位置来测试此功能。请注意，在Windows上，必须将外部GPS接收器连接到应用程序。有关更多信息，请参见Qt定位。

trans-unit.source: If Qt Location has been built before Qt WebEngine then this feature can be tested by using Maps and allowing it to find the current position of the user. Note that on Windows an external GPS receiver must be connected to the application. For more information, see Qt Positioning.
If Qt does not support the given text encoding the driver will issue a warning message and connect to the database using UNICODE_FSS.
trans-unit.target: 如果Qt不支持给定的文本编码,驱动程序将发出警告信息,并使用UNICODE_FSS连接到数据库。

trans-unit.source: If Qt does not use fontconfig, you must either provide the path to the fonts with QT_QPA_FONTDIR, or place the fonts under <Qt-install-path>/lib/fonts which is the default font location.
trans-unit.target: 如果Qt不使用fontconfig，则必须使用 QT_QPA_FONTDIR 提供字体的路径，或者将字体放在默认字体位置 <Qt-install-path>/lib/fonts 下。

trans-unit.source: If Qt is compiled with ICU support enabled, most codecs supported by ICU will also be available to the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果Qt在编译时启用了ICU支持,那么ICU支持的大多数编解码器也会被应用程序所使用。

trans-unit.source: If Qt was configured with libudev support, connecting or disconnecting an input device while the application is running (hot plugging) is supported. Then libudev development headers are present in the sysroot at configure time.
If Qt was configured with the -debug-and-release switch, then imported targets are created with both RELEASE and DEBUG configurations.
If Qt was configured with the -debug switch, an imported target with the DEBUG configuration is created.
If Qt was configured with the -release switch, an imported target with the RELEASE configuration is created.
If Return or Enter is pressed and the current text is valid (or can be made valid by the validator), the signal returnPressed() is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果按下Return或Enter键，并且当前文本有效（或可以由验证程序使之生效），则发出信号returnPressed（）。

trans-unit.source: If Sensors.conf specifies an identifier that is not registered, the system will fall back to the first registered identifier as the default.
trans-unit.target: 如果Sensors.conf指定了一个未注册的标识符,系统将回退到第一个注册的标识符作为默认值。

trans-unit.source: If T is QString, this class has the following additional members: filter, join, removeDuplicates, sort.
trans-unit.target: 如果T为QString，则此类具有以下其他成员：filter，join，removeDuplicates，sort。

trans-unit.source: If T is a QByteArray, this class has a couple more members that can be used. See the documentation for QByteArrayList for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果T是QByteArray，则此类可以使用几个其他成员。有关更多信息，请参见QByteArrayList的文档。

trans-unit.source: If T is a pointer type, QThreadStorage takes ownership of the data (which must be created on the heap with new) and deletes it when the thread exits, either normally or via termination.
trans-unit.target: 如果T是指针类型，则QThreadStorage拥有数据的所有权（必须使用 new 在堆上创建），并在线程退出时（通过正常退出或终止）将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If T is a pointer type, QThreadStorage takes ownership of the data and deletes it automatically either when the thread exits (either normally or via termination) or when setLocalData() is called again.
trans-unit.target: 如果T是指针类型，则QThreadStorage拥有数据的所有权，并在线程退出时（正常或通过终止）或再次调用setLocalData（）时自动将其删除。

trans-unit.source: If T is a pointer type, QThreadStorage takes ownership of the data (which must be created on the heap with new) and deletes it when the thread exits, either normally or via termination.
If T is a pointer type, returns true if the calling thread has non-zero data available.
trans-unit.target: 如果T是指针类型，则在调用线程具有可用的非零数据时返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: If T is a value type, returns whether the data has already been constructed by calling setLocalData or localData.
trans-unit.target: 如果T是值类型，则返回是否已经通过调用setLocalData或localData构造了数据。

trans-unit.source: If TLS 1.3 protocol was negotiated during a handshake, QSslSocket emits this signal after receiving NewSessionTicket message. Session and session ticket's lifetime hint are updated in the socket's configuration. The session can be used for session resumption (and a shortened handshake) in future TLS connections.
If Z scale is set to a negative number, the light will be emitted in the opposite direction.
If \printuntil is used without an argument, it expands to all the lines from the current position to the end of the quoted file.
trans-unit.target: 如果在没有参数的情况下使用printuntil,它将扩展到从当前位置到引用文件结束的所有行。

trans-unit.source: If a "What's This?" window is showing, this destroys it.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个 "这是什么?"窗口正在显示,这将摧毁它。

trans-unit.source: If a QAbstractSocket or QTcpSocket has the QNetworkProxy::DefaultProxy type, then the QNetworkProxy returned by this function is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果QAbstractSocket或QTcpSocket具有QNetworkProxy :: DefaultProxy类型，则使用此函数返回的QNetworkProxy。

trans-unit.source: If a QAbstractSocket or QTcpSocket has the QNetworkProxy::DefaultProxy type, then the QNetworkProxy set with this function is used. If you want more flexibility in determining which proxy is used, use the QNetworkProxyFactory class.
trans-unit.target: 如果QAbstractSocket或QTcpSocket具有QNetworkProxy :: DefaultProxy类型，则使用通过此函数设置的QNetworkProxy。如果要在确定使用哪个代理方面更具灵活性，请使用QNetworkProxyFactory类。

trans-unit.source: If a QAccessibleInterface implementation exists for the given
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的QAccessibleInterface实现存在

trans-unit.source: If a QLocale object is constructed with the default constructor, it will use the default locale's settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果QLocale对象是使用默认构造函数构造的，则它将使用默认语言环境的设置。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService can play media is will implement QMediaPlayerControl. This control provides a means to set the media to play, start, pause and stop playback, seek, and control the volume. It also provides feedback on the duration of the media, the current position, and buffering progress.
trans-unit.target: 如果QMediaService可以播放媒体，则将实现QMediaPlayerControl。此控件提供了一种设置媒体以播放，开始，暂停和停止播放，搜索和控制音量的方法。它还提供有关介质持续时间，当前位置和缓冲进度的反馈。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService can play media is will implement QMediaPlayerControl. This control provides a means to set the media to play, start, pause and stop playback, seek, and control the volume. It also provides feedback on the duration of the media, the current position, and buffering progress.

If a QMediaService can provide read or write access to the meta-data of its current media it will implement QMetaDataReaderControl. This control provides functions for both retrieving and setting meta-data values. Meta-data may be addressed by the keys defined in the QMediaMetaData namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果QMediaService可以提供对其当前媒体的元数据的读取或写入访问，它将实现QMetaDataReaderControl。此控件提供用于检索和设置元数据值的功能。可以通过QMediaMetaData命名空间中定义的键来寻址元数据。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService can provide read or write access to the meta-data of its current media it will implement QMetaDataReaderControl. This control provides functions for both retrieving and setting meta-data values. Meta-data may be addressed by the keys defined in the QMediaMetaData namespace.

If a QMediaService can provide write access to the meta-data of its current media it will implement QMetaDataWriterControl. This control provides functions for both retrieving and setting meta-data values. Meta-data may be addressed by the keys defined in the QMediaMetaData namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果QMediaService可以提供对其当前媒体的元数据的写访问权限，它将实现QMetaDataWriterControl。此控件提供用于检索和设置元数据值的功能。可以通过QMediaMetaData命名空间中定义的键来寻址元数据。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService can provide write access to the meta-data of its current media it will implement QMetaDataWriterControl. This control provides functions for both retrieving and setting meta-data values. Meta-data may be addressed by the keys defined in the QMediaMetaData namespace.

If a QMediaService can record media it will implement QMediaRecorderControl. This control provides a means to set the output location, and record, pause and stop recording via the setState() method. It also provides feedback on the duration of the recording.
trans-unit.target: 如果QMediaService可以记录媒体，它将实现QMediaRecorderControl。该控件提供了一种设置输出位置的方法，并通过setState（）方法记录，暂停和停止记录。它还提供有关记录持续时间的反馈。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService can record media it will implement QMediaRecorderControl. This control provides a means to set the output location, and record, pause and stop recording via the setState() method. It also provides feedback on the duration of the recording.

If a QMediaService can tune an analog radio device it will implement QRadioTunerControl. This control provides a means to tune a radio device to a specific frequency as well as search forwards and backwards for a signal.
trans-unit.target: 如果QMediaService可以调谐模拟无线电设备，它将实现QRadioTunerControl。该控件提供了一种将无线电设备调谐到特定频率以及向前和向后搜索信号的方法。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService can tune an analog radio device it will implement QRadioTunerControl. This control provides a means to tune a radio device to a specific frequency as well as search forwards and backwards for a signal.
If a QMediaService supports audio roles it may implement QCustomAudioRoleControl in order to provide access to roles unknown to Qt.
trans-unit.target: 如果QMediaService支持音频角色，则它可以实现QCustomAudioRoleControl，以提供对Qt未知角色的访问。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService supports audio roles it may implement QCustomAudioRoleControl in order to provide access to roles unknown to Qt.
If a QMediaService supports audio roles it will implement QAudioRoleControl.
trans-unit.target: 如果QMediaService支持音频角色，它将实现QAudioRoleControl。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService supports audio roles it will implement QAudioRoleControl.

If a QMediaService supports encoding audio data it will implement QAudioEncoderSettingsControl. This control provides information about the limits of restricted audio encoder options and allows the selection of a set of audio encoder settings as specified in a QAudioEncoderSettings object.
trans-unit.target: 如果QMediaService支持对音频数据进行编码，它将实现QAudioEncoderSettingsControl。该控件提供有关受限制的音频编码器选项限制的信息，并允许选择QAudioEncoderSettings对象中指定的一组音频编码器设置。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService supports encoding audio data it will implement QAudioEncoderSettingsControl. This control provides information about the limits of restricted audio encoder options and allows the selection of a set of audio encoder settings as specified in a QAudioEncoderSettings object.

If a QMediaService supports encoding image data it will implement QImageEncoderControl. This control allows to set image encoding settings and provides functions for quering supported image codecs and resolutions.
trans-unit.target: 如果QMediaService支持对图像数据进行编码，它将实现QImageEncoderControl。此控件允许设置图像编码设置，并提供查询支持的图像编解码器和分辨率的功能。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService supports encoding image data it will implement QImageEncoderControl. This control allows to set image encoding settings and provides functions for quering supported image codecs and resolutions.

If a QMediaService supports encoding video data it will implement QVideoEncoderSettingsControl. This control provides information about the limits of restricted video encoder options and allows the selection of a set of video encoder settings as specified in a QVideoEncoderSettings object.
trans-unit.target: 如果QMediaService支持对视频数据进行编码，它将实现QVideoEncoderSettingsControl。此控件提供有关受限制的视频编码器选项的限制的信息，并允许选择QVideoEncoderSettings对象中指定的一组视频编码器设置。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService supports encoding video data it will implement QVideoEncoderSettingsControl. This control provides information about the limits of restricted video encoder options and allows the selection of a set of video encoder settings as specified in a QVideoEncoderSettings object.

If a QMediaService supports gapless playback it will implement QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl. This control provides a means to set the next media or crossfade time for smooth transitions between tracks.
trans-unit.target: 如果QMediaService支持无缝播放，它将实现QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl。该控件提供了一种设置下一个媒体或淡入淡出时间以在音轨之间平滑过渡的方法。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService supports gapless playback it will implement QMediaGaplessPlaybackControl. This control provides a means to set the next media or crossfade time for smooth transitions between tracks.

If a QMediaService supports writing encoded data it will implement QMediaContainerControl. This control provides information about the output containers supported by a media service and allows one to be selected as the current output containers.
trans-unit.target: 如果QMediaService支持写入编码数据，它将实现QMediaContainerControl。此控件提供有关媒体服务支持的输出容器的信息，并允许选择其中一个作为当前输出容器。

trans-unit.source: If a QMediaService supports writing encoded data it will implement QMediaContainerControl. This control provides information about the output containers supported by a media service and allows one to be selected as the current output containers.
If a ValueAxis type is used instead of a BarCategoryAxis type for the main bar axis, the bars are grouped around the index value of the category.
trans-unit.target: 如果为主钢筋轴使用ValueAxis类型而不是BarCategoryAxis类型，则钢筋将围绕类别的索引值进行分组。

trans-unit.source: If a remove transition has been specified, it will not be applied until delayRemove is returned to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了移除过渡，则在delayRemove返回 false 之前将不应用过渡。

trans-unit.source: If a remove transition has been specified, it will not be applied until delayRemove is returned to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了移除过渡，则在delayRemove返回 false 之前将不应用过渡。

trans-unit.source: If a MouseArea is placed within an item that filters child mouse events, such as Flickable, the mouse events may be stolen from the MouseArea if a gesture is recognized by the parent item, e.g. a flick gesture. If preventStealing is set to true, no item will steal the mouse events.
trans-unit.target: 如果将MouseArea放置在过滤子级鼠标事件的项目（例如Flickable）中，则如果父项识别出手势（例如轻拂手势），则鼠标事件可能会从MouseArea中被盗。如果将preventStealing设置为true，则任何项目都不会窃取鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: If a MouseArea overlaps with the area of other MouseArea items, you can choose to propagate clicked, doubleClicked and pressAndHold events to these other items by setting propagateComposedEvents to true and rejecting events that should be propagated. See the propagateComposedEvents documentation for details.
trans-unit.target: 如果MouseArea与其他MouseArea项的区域重叠，则可以通过将 pressAndHold 设置为true并拒绝应传播的事件，来选择将 clicked ， doubleClicked 和pressAndHold事件传播到这些其他项。有关详细信息，请参见propertyComposedEvents文档。

trans-unit.source: If a ParticleGroup element is not defined for a group, the group will function normally as if none of the transition properties were set.
trans-unit.target: 如果未为组定义ParticleGroup元素，则该组将正常工作，就像未设置任何过渡属性一样。

trans-unit.source: If a pathItemCount has been set, it is possible that some items may be instantiated, but not considered to be currently on the path. Usually, these items would be set invisible, for example:
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置pathItemCount，则可能会实例化某些项目，但不认为它们当前在路径上。通常，这些项目将设置为不可见，例如：

trans-unit.source: If a PointerHandler is disabled, it will reject all events and no signals will be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用了PointerHandler，它将拒绝所有事件，并且不会发出任何信号。

trans-unit.source: If a QQmlNetworkAccessManagerFactory has been set and a QNetworkAccessManager has not yet been created, the QQmlNetworkAccessManagerFactory will be used to create the QNetworkAccessManager; otherwise the returned QNetworkAccessManager will have no proxy or cache set.
trans-unit.target: 如果已设置QQmlNetworkAccessManagerFactory且尚未创建QNetworkAccessManager，则将使用QQmlNetworkAccessManagerFactory创建QNetworkAccessManager；否则，将使用QQmlNetworkAccessManagerFactory创建QNetworkAccessManager。否则，返回的QNetworkAccessManager将没有设置代理或缓存。

trans-unit.source: If a QQuickWindow is the active window, the key event is delivered to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果QQuickWindow是活动窗口，则将键事件传递给它。

trans-unit.source: If a QSslDiffieHellmanParameters object is not valid, you can use the error() method to determine what error prevented the object from being constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果QSslDiffieHellmanParameters对象无效，则可以使用error（）方法确定是什么错误阻止了该对象的构造。

trans-unit.source: If a QObjectPicker is assigned to an entity with multiple children, an event will be triggered for each child entity that intersects the ray.
trans-unit.target: 如果将QObjectPicker分配给具有多个子级的实体，则将为与射线相交的每个子级实体触发一个事件。

trans-unit.source: If a QVERIFY() or QCOMPARE() is marked as an expected failure, but passes instead, an unexpected pass (XPASS) is written to the test log.
trans-unit.target: 如果将QVERIFY（）或QCOMPARE（）标记为预期失败，但通过了，则将意外通过（XPASS）写入测试日志。

trans-unit.source: If a state change has a Transition that matches the same property as a Behavior, the Transition animation overrides the Behavior for that state change. For general advice on using Behaviors to animate state changes, see Using Qt Quick Behaviors with States.

If a state change has a Transition that matches the same property as a Behavior, the Transition animation overrides the Behavior for that state change. For general advice on using Behaviors to animate state changes, see Using Qt Quick Behaviors with States.

If a state change has a Transition that matches the same property as a Behavior, the Transition animation overrides the Behavior for that state change. For general advice on using Behaviors to animate state changes, see Using Qt Quick Behaviors with States.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态变化有一个过渡，同样的属性相匹配的行为，在过渡动画覆盖该状态改变的行为。有关使用“行为”为状态变化制作动画的一般建议，请参阅“ 将Qt快速行为与状态一起使用”。

trans-unit.target: 如果将QValueAxis而不是QBarCategoryAxis用作主钢筋轴，则钢筋将围绕类别的索引值进行分组。

trans-unit.source: If a QWidgetAction is added for example to a QToolBar then QWidgetAction::createWidget() is called. Reimplementations of that function should create a new custom widget with the specified parent.
trans-unit.target: 如果QWidgetAction被添加到例如在QToolBar然后QWidgetAction :: createWidget（）被调用。重新实现该功能应使用指定的父级创建一个新的自定义窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: If a Component{} object is defined and createObject() or incubateObject() is called on that object, the creation context is the context in which the Component is defined
trans-unit.target: 如果一个 Component{} 对象被定义和的CreateObject（）或incubateObject（）被调用该对象上，创建上下文是在其中的上下文 Component 被定义

trans-unit.source: If a mailto URL is specified, the user's e-mail client will be used to open a composer window containing the options specified in the URL, similar to the way mailto links are handled by a Web browser.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 mailto URL，则将使用用户的电子邮件客户端打开包含URL中指定选项的编辑器窗口，类似于Web浏览器处理 mailto 链接的方式。

trans-unit.source: If a C++ method has a parameter with a QObject* type, the parameter value can be passed from QML using an object id or a JavaScript var value that references the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果C ++方法具有 QObject* 类型的参数，则可以使用对象 id 或引用该对象的JavaScript var值从QML传递参数值。

trans-unit.source: If a Map is placed within an item that filters child mouse and touch events, such as Flickable, the mouse and touch events may be stolen from the MapGestureArea if a gesture is recognized by the parent item, e.g. a flick gesture. If preventStealing is set to true, no item will steal the mouse and touch events.
trans-unit.target: 如果将地图放置在过滤子级鼠标和触摸事件的项目（例如Flickable）中，则如果父项识别出手势（例如轻拂手势），则鼠标和触摸事件可能会从MapGestureArea中窃取。如果将preventStealing设置为 true ，则没有项目会窃取鼠标并触摸事件。

trans-unit.source: If a MouseArea overlaps with the area of other MouseArea items, you can choose to propagate clicked, doubleClicked and pressAndHold events to these other items by setting propagateComposedEvents to true and rejecting events that should be propagated. See the propagateComposedEvents documentation for details.
If a ParticleGroup element is not defined for a group, the group will function normally as if none of the transition properties were set.

If a QLocale object is constructed with the default constructor, it will use the default locale's settings.

If a QML element has a custom property defined in QML, it becomes its own implicit type. This is explained in greater detail in an upcoming section. If multiple identical implicit types are defined inline in a component, some memory will be wasted. In that situation it is usually better to explicitly define a new component which can then be reused.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个 QML 元素在 QML 中定义了一个自定义属性,它就会成为自己的隐式类型。这一点在即将到来的一节中会有更详细的解释。如果在一个组件中内联定义了多个相同的隐式类型,就会浪费一些内存。在这种情况下,通常最好是显式定义一个新的组件,然后可以重复使用。

trans-unit.source: If a QWidgetAction is added for example to a QToolBar then QWidgetAction::createWidget() is called. Reimplementations of that function should create a new custom widget with the specified parent.
If a base URL has not been explicitly set, this method returns the application's current working directory.

trans-unit.source: If a certificate error is raised while loading a web page, the certificateError() signal is emitted. Certificate errors are handled by using the methods of the WebEngineCertificateError type.

trans-unit.source: If a characteristic is written using this mode, the peripheral shall send a write confirmation. If the operation is successful, the confirmation is emitted via the characteristicWritten() signal. Otherwise the CharacteristicWriteError is emitted. A characteristic must have set the QLowEnergyCharacteristic::Write property to support this write mode.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此模式写入特性，则外设应发送写入确认。如果操作成功，则通过featureWritten（）信号发出确认。否则会发出CharacteristicWriteError。特性必须已设置QLowEnergyCharacteristic :: Write属性以支持此写入模式。

trans-unit.source: If a characteristic is written using this mode, the remote peripheral shall not send a write confirmation. The operation's success cannot be determined and the payload must not be longer than 20 bytes. A characteristic must have set the QLowEnergyCharacteristic::WriteNoResponse property to support this write mode. Its adavantage is a quicker write operation as it may happen in between other device interactions.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此模式写入特性，则远程外围设备不得发送写入确认。无法确定操作是否成功，有效负载不得超过20个字节。特性必须已设置QLowEnergyCharacteristic :: WriteNoResponse属性以支持此写入模式。它的优势是更快的写入操作，因为它可能发生在其他设备交互之间。

trans-unit.source: If a characteristic is written using this mode, the remote peripheral shall not send a write confirmation. The operation's success cannot be determined and the payload must not be longer than 8 bytes. A bond must exist between the two devices and the link must not be encrypted. A characteristic must have set the QLowEnergyCharacteristic::WriteSigned property to support this write mode. This value was introduced in Qt 5.7 and is currently only supported on Android and on Linux with BlueZ 5 and a kernel version 3.7 or newer.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此模式写入特性，则远程外围设备不得发送写入确认。无法确定操作是否成功，有效负载不得超过8个字节。两个设备之间必须存在绑定，并且链接不得加密。特性必须已设置QLowEnergyCharacteristic :: WriteSigned属性以支持此写入模式。此值在Qt 5.7中引入，目前仅在Android和具有BlueZ 5且内核版本3.7或更高版本的Linux上受支持。

trans-unit.source: If a characteristic is written using this mode, the remote peripheral shall not send a write confirmation. The operation's success cannot be determined and the payload must not be longer than 8 bytes. A bond must exist between the two devices and the link must not be encrypted. A characteristic must have set the QLowEnergyCharacteristic::WriteSigned property to support this write mode. This value was introduced in Qt 5.7 and is currently only supported on Android and on Linux with BlueZ 5 and a kernel version 3.7 or newer.

If a chosen font does not include all the characters that need to be displayed, QFont will try to find the characters in the nearest equivalent fonts. When a QPainter draws a character from a font the QFont will report whether or not it has the character; if it does not, QPainter will draw an unfilled square.
trans-unit.target: 如果所选字体未包括所有需要显示的字符，则QFont将尝试查找最接近的等效字体中的字符。当QPainter从字体中绘制字符时，QFont将报告它是否具有该字符。如果没有，QPainter将绘制一个未填充的正方形。

trans-unit.source: If a chosen font does not include all the characters that need to be displayed, QFont will try to find the characters in the nearest equivalent fonts. If a client is currently connected and it has enabled notifications or indications for the characteristic, the respective information will be sent. If a device has enabled notifications or indications for the characteristic and that device is currently not connected, but a bond exists between it and the local device, then the notification or indication will be sent on the next reconnection.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端当前已连接,并且它已为该特性启用了通知或指示,则将发送相应的信息。如果一个设备已经启用了该特性的通知或指示,而该设备目前没有连接,但它与本地设备之间存在结合,那么通知或指示将在下次重新连接时发送。

trans-unit.source: If a product query for app fails, then either the trial has expired or the license is invalid. Your app should check for this product and react accordingly, for instance by showing a dialog to the user.

trans-unit.source: If a property is not explicitly set, do not change the text format's property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有明确设置属性,不要改变文本格式的属性值。

trans-unit.target: 如果没有明确设置属性,则用默认值覆盖文本格式的属性。

trans-unit.source: If a rectangle with an invalid size is specified (the default), the entire widget is painted.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了一个无效大小的矩形(默认),则整个小组件都会被绘制。

trans-unit.source: If a relation's display column name is also used as a column name in the relational table, or if it is used as display column name in more than one relation it will be aliased. The alias is the relation's table name, display column name and a unique id joined by an underscore (e.g. tablename_columnname_id). QSqlRecord::fieldName() will return the aliased column name. All occurrences of the duplicate display column name are aliased when duplication is detected, but no aliasing is done to the column names in the main table. The aliasing doesn't affect QSqlRelation, so QSqlRelation::displayColumn() will return the original display column name.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个关系的显示列名称也用作关系表中的列名称，或者如果它在多个关系中用作显示列名称，则将使用别名。别名是关系的表名，显示列名和带下划线的唯一ID（例如tablename_columnname_id）。QSqlRecord :: fieldName（）将返回别名列名称。检测到重复时，所有出现的重复显示列名都会被别名化，但是不会对主表中的列名进行别名化。别名不会影响QSqlRelation，因此QSqlRelation :: displayColumn（）将返回原始显示列名称。

trans-unit.source: If a relational table contains keys that refer to non-existent rows in the referenced table, the rows containing the invalid keys will not be exposed through the model. The user or the database is responsible for keeping referential integrity.
trans-unit.target: 如果关系表包含的键引用了被引用表中不存在的行,那么包含无效键的行将不会通过模型暴露出来。用户或数据库负责保持引用的完整性。

trans-unit.source: If a remove transition has been specified, it is applied after this signal is handled, providing that delayRemove is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果已指定移除过渡，则在处理此信号后应用该过渡，前提是delayRemove为false。

trans-unit.source: If a remove transition has been specified, it is applied after this signal is handled, providing that delayRemove is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果已指定移除过渡，则在处理此信号后应用该过渡，前提是delayRemove为false。

trans-unit.source: If a replica is instantiated but its node is not connected to the node that hosts the requested source (or that object lives in a host node process, but sharing/remoting has not been enabled for the QObject), the Replica will still be created, but will remain uninitialized.

trans-unit.source: If a scroll area is used to display the contents of a widget that contains child widgets arranged in a layout, it is important to realize that the size policy of the layout will also determine the size of the widget. This is especially useful to know if you intend to dynamically change the contents of the layout. In such cases, setting the layout's size constraint property to one which provides constraints on the minimum and/or maximum size of the layout (e.g., QLayout::SetMinAndMaxSize) will cause the size of the scroll area to be updated whenever the contents of the layout changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果滚动区域用于显示包含布局中排列的子窗口小部件的窗口小部件的内容，则重要的是要意识到布局的大小策略也将确定窗口小部件的大小。这对于了解是否打算动态更改布局的内容特别有用。在这种情况下，将布局的大小约束属性设置为一个对布局的最小和/或最大大小提供约束的属性（例如QLayout :: SetMinAndMaxSize）将导致滚动区域的大小在每当滚动条的内容被更新时进行更新。布局更改。

trans-unit.source: If a signal is connected to several slots, the slots are activated in the same order as the order the connection was made, when the signal is emitted
trans-unit.target: 如果一个信号连接到几个槽位上,当信号发出时,槽位的激活顺序与连接的顺序相同。

trans-unit.source: If a signal is connected to several slots, the slots are activated in the same order in which the connections were made, when the signal is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个信号连接到几个槽位上,当信号发出时,这些槽位就会按照连接的顺序被激活。

trans-unit.source: If a single license key for the control is not sufficient (ie. you want differnet developers to receive different license keys) you can specify an empty key to indicate that the control requires a license, and reimplement QAxFactory::validateLicenseKey() to verify that a license exists on the system (ie. through a license file).
trans-unit.target: 如果该控件的单个许可证密钥不足（即，您希望Differentnet开发人员接收不同的许可证密钥），则可以指定一个空密钥以指示该控件需要许可证，然后重新实现QAxFactory :: validateLicenseKey（）以验证系统上存在许可证（即通过许可证文件）。

trans-unit.source: If a size has been defined, the shape property can be used to affect a non-rectangular area.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经定义了尺寸,形状属性可以用来影响非矩形区域。

trans-unit.target: 如果较少的接触点与父级接触，则将忽略它们。

trans-unit.source: If a state change has a Transition that matches the same property as a Behavior, the Transition animation overrides the Behavior for that state change.

trans-unit.source: If a state has property assignments, and the transition into the state has animations for the properties, the state can potentially be exited before the properties have been assigned to the values defines by the state. This is true in particular when there are transitions out from the state that do not depend on the propertiesAssigned() signal, as described in the previous section.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态具有属性分配，并且到该状态的过渡具有该属性的动画，则可以在将属性分配给该状态定义的值之前退出该状态。如上一节所述，当从状态中跳出的状态不依赖于propertiesAssigned（）信号时，尤其如此。

trans-unit.source: If a string is a prefix of an Acceptable string, it is considered Intermediate. For example, "" and "A" are Intermediate for the regexp [A-Z][0-9] (whereas "_" would be Invalid).
If a string is a prefix of an Acceptable string, it is considered Intermediate. For example, "" and "A" are Intermediate for the regexp [A-Z][0-9] (whereas "_" would be Invalid).

trans-unit.target: 如果一个样式没有从右到左的意识,它就会像从左到右一样显示项目。

trans-unit.source: If a test exposes a known bug that will not be fixed immediately, use the QEXPECT_FAIL() macro to document the failure and reference the bug tracking identifier for the known issue. When the test is run, expected failures will be marked as XFAIL in the test output and will not be counted as failures when setting the test program's return code. If an expected failure does not occur, the XPASS (unexpected pass) will be reported in the test output and will be counted as a test failure.

If a test is expected to cause Qt to output a warning or debug message on the console, it should call QTest::ignoreMessage() to filter that message out of the test output and to fail the test if the message is not output.
If a text block is part of a list, it can also have a list format that is accessible with the listFormat() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个文本块是列表的一部分,它也可以有一个列表格式,可以通过listFormat()函数访问。

trans-unit.source: If a text encoding is specified using the meta tag, it is picked up by Qt::codecForHtml(). trans-unit.source: If a text has ben set using setButtonText(), this text is returned.

trans-unit.source: If a thread locks a resource but does not unlock it, the application may freeze because the resource will become permanently unavailable to other threads. This can happen, for example, if an exception is thrown and forces the current function to return without releasing its lock.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个线程锁定了一个资源,但没有解锁,应用程序可能会冻结,因为该资源将对其他线程永久不可用。例如,如果抛出异常并迫使当前函数返回而不释放其锁,就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: If a timeout occures during the handshake, the handshakeTimeout() signal is emitted. The application must call handleTimeout() to retransmit handshake messages; handleTimeout() returns true if a timeout has occurred, false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果超时在握手期间occures，所述handshakeTimeout（）信号被发射。应用程序必须调用handleTimeout（）来重新传输握手消息；如果发生超时，handleTimeout（）返回 true ，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: If a transaction is not finalized, it will be called again for the same transaction the next time the application starts up, providing another chance to store the data. The transaction for a consumable product has to be finalized before the product can be purchased again.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个交易没有最终完成,那么在下一次应用程序启动时,将再次调用相同的交易,提供另一次存储数据的机会。消耗品的交易必须最终完成,才能再次购买该产品。

trans-unit.source: If a transaction is not finalized, the transactionReady() signal is emitted again for the same transaction the next time the product is registered, providing another chance to store the data. The transaction for a consumable product must be finalized before the product can be purchased again.
trans-unit.target: 如果未完成交易，则下次注册产品时，将为同一交易再次发出transactionReady（）信号，从而提供了另一个存储数据的机会。必须先完成消耗品的交易，然后才能再次购买该产品。

If a view specifies this generic displaced transition as well as a specific addDisplaced, moveDisplaced or removeDisplaced transition, the more specific transition will be used instead of the generic displaced transition when the relevant operation occurs, providing that the more specific transition has not been disabled (by setting enabled to false). trans-unit.source: If a web page contains two videos that are started in sequence, this signal gets emitted only once, for the first video to generate sound. After both videos are stopped, the signal is emitted upon the last sound generated. This means that the signal is emitted both when any kind of sound is generated and when everything is completely silent within a web page, regardless of the number of audio streams.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个网页包含两个视频并依次启动,这个信号只在第一个视频产生声音时发出一次。在两个视频都停止后,信号在最后一个声音产生时发出。这意味着,当任何一种声音产生时和当网页内的所有东西完全静止时,无论音频流的数量如何,信号都会被发出。

trans-unit.source: If an API is implemented in terms of pluggable or platform-specific backends that do the heavy-lifting, make sure to write tests that cover the code-paths all the way down into the backends. Testing the upper layer API parts using a mock backend is a nice way to isolate errors in the API layer from the backends, but it is complementary to tests that run the actual implementation with real-world data.

If an action is checkable, an ExclusiveGroup can be attached to it. All the actions sharing the same exclusive group become mutually exclusive selectable, meaning that only the last checked action will actually be checked.

trans-unit.source: If an add transition is specified, it is applied immediately after this signal is handled.

trans-unit.source: If an application needs true RNG data in bulk, it should use the operating system facilities (such as /dev/random on Linux) directly and wait for entropy to become available. If the application requires PRNG engines of cryptographic quality but not of true randomness, QRandomGenerator::system() may still be used (see section below).
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序需要大量的真实RNG数据，则应直接使用操作系统工具（例如Linux上的 /dev/random ）并等待熵变为可用。如果应用程序需要具有加密质量但不是真正随机性的PRNG引擎，则仍可以使用QRandomGenerator :: system（）（请参阅以下部分）。

trans-unit.source: If an application performs poorly, make sure that rendering is actually the bottleneck. Use a profiler! The environment variable QSG_RENDER_TIMING=1 will output a number of useful timing parameters which can be useful in pinpointing where a problem lies.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序性能不佳，请确保渲染实际上是瓶颈。使用探查器！环境变量 QSG_RENDER_TIMING=1 将输出许多有用的时序参数，这些参数在查明问题所在时很有用。

trans-unit.source: If an application requests a name that is already owned, no queueing will be performed. The registeredService() call will simply fail. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个应用程序请求一个已经拥有的名称,将不会执行队列。registeredService()的调用将直接失败。这是默认的。

trans-unit.source: If an application uses plugins or imports that depend on other modules, these modules have to be listed in the application's dependencies. This is because Qt Creator does not know ahead of time which imports or plugins your application will end up loading.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个应用程序使用依赖于其他模块的插件或导入,这些模块必须在应用程序的依赖关系中列出。这是因为Qt Creator无法提前知道您的应用程序最终会加载哪些进口或插件。

trans-unit.source: If an application uses plugins that depend on other modules, these modules must be listed in the application's dependencies. For more information, see Dependencies Detection.

trans-unit.source: If an early return is taken or an exception is thrown before the sem.release() call is reached, the semaphore is not released, possibly preventing the thread waiting in the corresponding sem.acquire() call from ever continuing execution.
trans-unit.target: 如果在到达 sem.release() 调用之前提前返回或引发了异常，则不会释放该信号量，这可能会阻止等待相应 sem.acquire() 调用中的线程继续执行。

trans-unit.source: If an effect is disabled, the source will be rendered with as normal, with no interference from the effect. If the effect is enabled, the source will be rendered with the effect applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用了效果,则源将按正常方式渲染,没有效果的干扰。如果启用了效果,则源将在应用了效果的情况下呈现。

trans-unit.source: If an empty string is assigned to text, then isTextGenerated will be set to true and text will return a string which is locally formatted according to countryCode and based on the properties of the address. Modifying the address properties such as street, city and so on may cause the contents of text to change.
trans-unit.target: 如果将空字符串分配给 text ，则isTextGenerated将设置为true，并且 text 将返回一个字符串，该字符串根据countryCode和地址的属性进行本地格式化。修改地址属性（例如街道，城市等）可能会导致 text 内容更改。

trans-unit.source: If an empty string is provided to setText(), then isTextGenerated() will be set to true and text() will return a string which is locally formatted according to countryCode() and based on the elements of the address such as street, city and so on. Because the text string is generated from the address elements, a sequence of calls such as text(), setStreet(), text() may return different strings for each invocation of text().
trans-unit.target: 如果为setText（）提供了空字符串，则isTextGenerated（）将设置为true，并且text（）将返回一个字符串，该字符串根据countryCode（）并根据地址的元素（例如街道，城市）进行本地格式化等等。因为文本字符串是从地址元素生成的，所以每次调用text（）时，诸如text（），setStreet（），text（）之类的调用序列都可能返回不同的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If an error happened during writing, deletes the temporary file and returns false. Otherwise, renames it to the final fileName and returns true on success. Finally, closes the device.
trans-unit.target: 如果在写入过程中发生错误，请删除临时文件并返回 false 。否则，将其重命名为最终文件名，并在成功时返回 true 。最后，关闭设备。

trans-unit.source: If an error is encountered, the machine will look for an errorState, and if one is available, it will enter this state. After the error state is entered, the type of the error can be retrieved with error(). The execution of the state graph will not stop when the error state is entered. If no error state applies to the erroneous state, the machine will stop executing and an error message will be printed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到错误，机器将查找errorState，如果有错误，它将进入此状态。进入错误状态后，可以使用error（）检索错误的类型。输入错误状态后，状态图的执行不会停止。如果没有错误状态适用于错误状态，则机器将停止执行并将错误消息打印到控制台。

trans-unit.source: If an error is encountered, the machine will look for an error state, and if one is available, it will enter this state. The types of errors possible are described by the Error enum. After the error state is entered, the type of the error can be retrieved with error(). The execution of the state graph will not stop when the error state is entered. If no error state applies to the erroneous state, the machine will stop executing and an error message will be printed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到错误，机器将查找错误状态，如果有错误，它将进入此状态。错误枚举描述了可能的错误类型。输入错误状态后，可以使用错误（）检索错误的类型。输入错误状态后，状态图的执行不会停止。如果没有错误状态适用于错误状态，则机器将停止执行并将错误消息打印到控制台。

trans-unit.target: 如果发送错误,Qt D-Bus将忽略来自被调用槽的返回值和任何输出参数。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs, QSslSocket emits the sslErrors() signal. In this case, if no action is taken to ignore the error(s), the connection is dropped. To continue, despite the occurrence of an error, you can call ignoreSslErrors(), either from within this slot after the error occurs, or any time after construction of the QSslSocket and before the connection is attempted. This will allow QSslSocket to ignore the errors it encounters when establishing the identity of the peer. Ignoring errors during an SSL handshake should be used with caution, since a fundamental characteristic of secure connections is that they should be established with a successful handshake.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生错误，QSslSocket将发出sslErrors（）信号。在这种情况下，如果未采取任何措施忽略错误，则连接将被丢弃。要继续操作，即使发生错误，也可以在发生错误后，或者在构造QSslSocket之后且尝试连接之前的任何时间，从此插槽中调用ignoreSslErrors（）。这将允许QSslSocket忽略在建立对等方身份时遇到的错误。应谨慎使用忽略SSL握手期间的错误，因为安全连接的基本特征是应通过成功的握手来建立它们。

trans-unit.source: If an inline item is pushed, the item is temporarily re-parented into the StackView. When the item is later popped off, it gets re-parented back to its original owner again. If, however, an item is pushed as a component or a URL, the actual item will be created as an item from that component. This happens automatically when the item is about to become the current item in the stack. Ownership of the item will then normally be taken by the StackView, which will automatically destroy the item when it is later popped off. The component that declared the item, by contrast, remains in the ownership of the application and is not destroyed by the stack. This can be overridden by explicitly setting destroyOnPop in the list of arguments given to push.
trans-unit.target: 如果内联项目被推送，则该项目会暂时重新成为StackView的父级。稍后弹出该项目时，它将再次重新成为其父项的父项。但是，如果将某个项目作为组件或URL推送，则实际项目将作为该组件中的项目创建。当该项目将要成为堆栈中的当前项目时，这会自动发生。通常，该物品的所有权将由StackView获取，该物品会在以后弹出时自动销毁该物品。相反，声明该项目的组件保留在应用程序的所有权中，并且不会被堆栈破坏。可以通过在提供给push的参数列表中显式设置 destroyOnPop 来覆盖此设置。

trans-unit.source: If an inline item is pushed, the item is temporarily re-parented into the StackView. When the item is later popped off, it gets re-parented back to its original owner again. If, however, an item is pushed as a component or a URL, the actual item will be created as an item from that component. This happens automatically when the item is about to become the current item in the stack. Ownership of the item will then normally be taken by the StackView, which will automatically destroy the item when it is later popped off. The component that declared the item, by contrast, remains in the ownership of the application and is not destroyed by the stack. This can be overridden by explicitly setting destroyOnPop in the list of arguments given to push.

trans-unit.source: If an item accepts a mouse button, it will become the mouse grabber item when a mouse press event is delivered for that mouse button. However, if the item does not accept the button, QGraphicsScene will forward the mouse events to the first item beneath it that does.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个项目接受鼠标按钮，则在为该鼠标按钮传递鼠标按下事件时，它将成为鼠标捕获器项目。但是，如果该项目不接受该按钮，则QGraphicsScene会将鼠标事件转发到该按钮下方的第一个项目。

trans-unit.source: If an item becomes invisible while grabbing the mouse, (i.e., while it is receiving mouse events,) it will automatically lose the mouse grab, and the grab is not regained by making the item visible again; it must receive a new mouse press to regain the mouse grab.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个物品在抓取鼠标时变得不可见,(即在它接收鼠标事件时,)它将自动失去鼠标抓取,并且不能通过使物品再次可见来重新获得抓取,它必须接受新的鼠标按压才能重新获得鼠标抓取。

trans-unit.source: If an item does not accept the mouse button for a particular mouse event, the mouse event will not be delivered to the item and will be delivered to the next item in the item hierarchy instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个项目不接受特定鼠标事件的鼠标按钮,该鼠标事件将不会被传递给该项目,而会被传递给项目层次结构中的下一个项目。

trans-unit.source: If an item has a focus proxy, the focus proxy will receive input focus when the item gains input focus. The item itself will still have focus (i.e., hasFocus() will return true), but only the focus proxy will receive the keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个项目具有焦点代理，则当该项目获得输入焦点时，焦点代理将接收输入焦点。该项目本身仍将具有焦点（即hasFocus（）将返回true），但只有焦点代理将接收键盘输入。

trans-unit.source: If an item has child objects, hasChildren() returns true for the corresponding index.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目具有子对象，则hasChildren（）对于相应的索引返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: If an item within a Column is not visible, or if it has a width or height of 0, the item will not be laid out and it will not be visible within the column. Also, since a Column automatically positions its children vertically, a child item within a Column should not set its y position or vertically anchor itself using the top, bottom, anchors.verticalCenter, fill or centerIn anchors. If you need to perform these actions, consider positioning the items without the use of a Column.
trans-unit.target: 如果“列”中的某个项目不可见，或者其宽度或高度为0，则该项目将不会布局，并且在列中也不可见。此外，由于一列自动垂直定位其子，一列中的子项不应设置它的Ÿ位置或垂直使用锚本身顶部，底部，anchors.verticalCenter，填充或centerIn锚。如果需要执行这些操作，请考虑在不使用“列”的情况下放置项目。

trans-unit.source: If an item within a Flow is not visible, or if it has a width or height of 0, the item will not be laid out and it will not be visible within the Flow. Also, since a Flow automatically positions its children, a child item within a Flow should not set its x or y positions or anchor itself with any of the anchor properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果Flow中的某个项目不可见，或者其宽度或高度为0，则该项目将不会布局，并且在Flow中也不可见。同样，由于Flow自动定位其子项，因此Flow中的子项不应设置其x或y位置或使用任何锚点属性对其自身进行锚点。

trans-unit.source: If an item within a Grid is not visible, or if it has a width or height of 0, the item will not be laid out and it will not be visible within the column. Also, since a Grid automatically positions its children, a child item within a Grid should not set its x or y positions or anchor itself with any of the anchor properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果网格中的某个项目不可见，或者其宽度或高度为0，则该项目将不会进行布局，并且在列中也不可见。另外，由于Grid会自动定位其子项，因此Grid中的子项不应设置其x或y位置，也不应使用任何锚点属性对其自身进行锚点。

trans-unit.source: If an item within a Row is not visible, or if it has a width or height of 0, the item will not be laid out and it will not be visible within the row. Also, since a Row automatically positions its children horizontally, a child item within a Row should not set its x position or horizontally anchor itself using the left, right, anchors.horizontalCenter, fill or centerIn anchors. If you need to perform these actions, consider positioning the items without the use of a Row.
trans-unit.target: 如果“行”中的某个项目不可见，或者其宽度或高度为0，则该项目将不会布局，并且在行中也不可见。此外，由于行自动水平定位的孩子，一个行内的子项不应设置它的X位置或水平使用锚本身左，右，anchors.horizo​​ntalCenter，填充或centerIn锚。如果需要执行这些操作，请考虑在不使用“行”的情况下放置项目。

trans-unit.source: If an operation is not ongoing, invoking cancel() has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个操作没有进行,调用cancel()就没有效果。

trans-unit.source: If an orientation and endRotation have been specified for the PathAnimation, orientationExitDuration can be used to smoothly transition from the rotation given by the path orientation to the specified endRotation.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经为PathAnimation指定了orientation和endRotation，则可以使用orientationExitDuration从路径方向给定的旋转平稳过渡到指定的endRotation。

trans-unit.source: If an orientation and endRotation have been specified for the PathAnimation, orientationExitDuration can be used to smoothly transition from the rotation given by the path orientation to the specified endRotation.

trans-unit.source: If an orientation has been specified for the PathAnimation, and the starting rotation of the item does not match that given by the orientation, orientationEntryDuration can be used to smoothly transition from the item's starting rotation to the rotation given by the path orientation.
trans-unit.target: 如果为PathAnimation指定了方向，并且该项目的开始旋转与该方向给定的旋转不匹配，则可以使用orientationEntryDuration从该项目的开始旋转平滑过渡到由路径方向给定的旋转。

trans-unit.source: If an orientation has been specified for the PathAnimation, and the path doesn't end with the item at the desired rotation, the endRotation property can be used to manually specify an end rotation.

If an orientation has been specified for the PathAnimation, and the starting rotation of the item does not match that given by the orientation, orientationEntryDuration can be used to smoothly transition from the item's starting rotation to the rotation given by the path orientation.
If an orientation has been specified for the PathAnimation, and the path doesn't end with the item at the desired rotation, the endRotation property can be used to manually specify an end rotation.

If an orientation has been specified for the PathAnimation, and the starting rotation of the item does not match that given by the orientation, orientationEntryDuration can be used to smoothly transition from the item's starting rotation to the rotation given by the path orientation.

If an origin manager does not supply a place id, it may be necessary to provide some other means of cross-referencing/matching. One approach might be to do so via the place coordinates, if the coordinate of a place in the origin manager is identical or close to a place in the destination manager, there is a high likelihood that they are the same place. In this case, the manager might implement QPlaceManager::matchingPlaces() to accept a QPlaceMatchRequest with a parameter key of 'proximity' and a parameter value of the distance two places must be in order to detect a match. for example if an origin place and destination place are within 50m of each other, they can be considered the same place.
trans-unit.target: 如果来源管理者未提供地点ID，则可能有必要提供其他一些交叉引用/匹配的方法。一种方法可能是通过地点坐标进行操作，如果原点管理器中某个地点的坐标与目标管理器中某个地点的坐标相同或相近，则很有可能它们是同一地点。在这种情况下，管理器可能会实现QPlaceManager :: matchingPlaces（）来接受参数为'proximity'且参数值必须为两个位置的距离的QPlaceMatchRequest才能检测到匹配。例如，如果起点和终点之间的距离在50m之内，则可以将它们视为同一地点。

trans-unit.source: If an unsupported parameter is specified the camera may fail to load, or the setting may be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了不支持的参数,摄像机可能无法加载,或者可能会忽略设置。

trans-unit.source: If animating properties other than stroke and fill colors is a must, it is recommended to target systems providing GL_NV_path_rendering where the cost of property changes is smaller.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须对除笔触和填充颜色以外的属性进行动画处理，建议将目标设置为提供 GL_NV_path_rendering 的系统，而属性更改的成本较小。

trans-unit.source: If another application already has the service name registered, attempt to replace it.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一个应用程序已经注册了服务名称,请尝试替换它。

trans-unit.source: If another process (or another thread) has created the lock file already, this function will block until that process (or thread) releases it.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一个进程(或另一个线程)已经创建了锁文件,这个函数将阻塞,直到该进程(或线程)释放它。

trans-unit.source: If another vertex array object is then bound you can later restore the set of state associated with this object by calling bind() on this object once again. This allows efficient changes between vertex data states in rendering functions.
trans-unit.target: 如果再绑定另一个顶点数组对象,你以后可以通过再次调用这个对象上的bind()来恢复与这个对象相关的状态集。这样就可以在渲染函数中高效地改变顶点数据状态。

trans-unit.source: If any error occurs when reading the image, read() will return a null QImage. You can then call error() to find the type of error that occurred, or errorString() to get a human readable description of what went wrong.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取图像时发生任何错误，则read（）将返回空QImage。然后，您可以调用error（）来查找发生的错误的类型，或者可以调用errorString（）来获取对错误的理解的可读描述。

trans-unit.source: If any error occurs when writing the image, write() will return false. You can then call error() to find the type of error that occurred, or errorString() to get a human readable description of what went wrong.
trans-unit.target: 如果在写入图像时发生任何错误，则write（）将返回false。然后，您可以调用error（）来查找发生的错误的类型，或者可以调用errorString（）来获取对错误的理解的可读描述。

trans-unit.source: If any handler with defined cursorShape is active, that cursor will appear. Else if the HoverHandler has a defined cursorShape, that cursor will appear. Otherwise, the cursor of

If any handler with defined cursorShape is active, that cursor will appear. Else if the HoverHandler has a defined cursorShape, that cursor will appear. Otherwise, the cursor of parentItem will appear.
If any logical particle groups are specified here, then the affector will only be triggered if the particle being examined intersects with a particle of one of these groups.
trans-unit.target: 如果这里指定了任何逻辑粒子组,那么只有当被检查的粒子与这些粒子组中的一个粒子相交时,才会触发影响器。

trans-unit.source: If any of the widgets have stretch factors set to zero they will only get more space if no other widgets want the space. Of these, space is allocated to widgets with an Expanding size policy first.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何窗口小部件的拉伸因子设置为零，则只有在没有其他窗口小部件需要空间的情况下，它们才会获得更多空间。其中，首先使用扩展大小策略将空间分配给小部件。

trans-unit.source: If any of the widgets have stretch factors set, with a value greater than zero, then they are allocated space in proportion to their stretch factor (explained below).
trans-unit.target: 如果任何小组件设置了拉伸因子,且其值大于零,则按其拉伸因子的比例分配空间(如下所述)。

trans-unit.source: If any post processing functionality is enabled, then it can be assumed that the result of the scene renderer was a texture that is an input for the post processing phase. All post processing methods are additional passes that operate on this scene input texture.
If applicable, QQmlParserStatus::componentComplete() is called on objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果适用，则在对象上调用QQmlParserStatus :: componentComplete（）。

trans-unit.source: If attributes are reported by QXmlContentHandler::startElement() this class is used to pass the attribute values.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性由QXmlContentHandler :: startElement（）报告，则该类用于传递属性值。

trans-unit.source: If auto-deletion is enabled, QThreadPool will automatically delete this runnable after calling run(); otherwise, ownership remains with the application programmer.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了自动删除，则QThreadPool将在调用run（）之后自动删除此可运行对象。否则，所有权仍归应用程序程序员所有。

trans-unit.source: If auto-exclusivity is enabled, checkable buttons that belong to the same parent item behave as if they were part of the same ButtonGroup. Only one button can be checked at any time; checking another button automatically unchecks the previously checked one.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了自动排他性，则属于同一父项的可检查按钮的行为就好像它们属于同一ButtonGroup一样。任何时候都只能检查一个按钮；选中另一个按钮会自动取消选中先前选中的按钮。

trans-unit.source: If auto-exclusivity is enabled, checkable buttons that belong to the same parent widget behave as if they were part of the same exclusive button group. In an exclusive button group, only one button can be checked at any time; checking another button automatically unchecks the previously checked one.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了自动独占性,则属于同一父部件的可选中按钮的行为就像它们是同一个独占按钮组的一部分。在一个专属按钮组中,任何时候只能选中一个按钮;选中另一个按钮会自动取消选中之前的按钮。

trans-unit.source: If autoRepeat is enabled, then the pressed(), released(), and clicked() signals are emitted at regular intervals when the button is down. autoRepeat is off by default. The initial delay and the repetition interval are defined in milliseconds by autoRepeatDelay and autoRepeatInterval.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了autoRepeat，则按下按钮时，会定期发出按下（），释放（）和单击（）信号。默认情况下，autoRepeat是关闭的。初始延迟和重复间隔是通过autoRepeatDelay和autoRepeatInterval以毫秒为单位定义的。

trans-unit.source: If autoRotate is true, then the particle's rotation will be set so that it faces the direction of travel, plus any rotation from the rotation or rotationVelocity properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果autoRotate为true，则将设置粒子的旋转，使其面向行进方向，再加上来自rotation或rotationVelocity属性的任何旋转。

trans-unit.source: If available, the QVideoWidget class can be used to view the video. As the life time of QMediaPlayer can be longer than the playback of one QMediaContent, this property may change over time, the videoAvailableChanged signal can be used to monitor it's status.
trans-unit.target: 如果可用，可以使用QVideoWidget类查看视频。由于QMediaPlayer的生存时间可以长于一个QMediaContent的播放时间，因此此属性可能会随着时间而改变，videoAvailableChanged信号可用于监视其状态。

trans-unit.target: 如果后台不支持在活动状态下应用此更改,则会在更改设置前停止,更改后重新启动。否则,后台应在当前状态下应用该更改,必要时,摄像机状态将显示进度。

trans-unit.target: 如果与活​​动绑定，则根据活动是否对用户可见，允许提高目标服务的过程重要性。有关更多详细信息，请参见BIND_ADJUST_WITH_ACTIVITY文档。

If both variants contain pointers to QObject derived types, QVariant will check whether the types are related and point to the same object.

trans-unit.source: If called from initTestCase_data(), the QSKIP() macro will skip all test and _data functions. If called from initTestCase() when there is no initTestCase_data(), or when it only sets up one row, QSKIP() will likewise skip the whole test. However, if initTestCase_data() contains more than one row, then initTestCase() is called (followed by each test and finally the wrap-up) once per row of it. Therefore, a call to QSKIP() in initTestCase() will merely skip all test functions for the current row of global data, set up by initTestCase_data().

If called from a test function, the QSKIP() macro stops execution of the test without adding a failure to the test log. You can use it to skip tests that wouldn't make sense in the current configuration. For example, a test of font rendering may call QSKIP() if the needed fonts are not installed on the test system.

If called from a test function, the QSKIP() macro stops execution of the test without adding a failure to the test log. You can use it to skip tests that wouldn't make sense in the current configuration. The text
trans-unit.target: 如果从测试函数中调用QSKIP()宏,则会停止测试的执行,而不会将失败添加到测试日志中。你可以用它来跳过那些在当前配置中没有意义的测试。文本

trans-unit.source: If called from an _data function, the QSKIP() macro will stop execution of the _data function and will prevent execution of the associated test function. This entirely omits a data-driven test. To omit individual rows, make them conditional by using a simple if (condition) newRow(...) << ... in the _data function, instead of using QSKIP() in the test function.
If called from an _data function, the QSKIP() macro will stop execution of the _data function and will prevent execution of the associated test function.

trans-unit.source: If exclusionPolicy is set to Exclusive, only one checkable action in the action group can ever be active at any time. If the user chooses another checkable action in the group, the one they chose becomes active and the one that was active becomes inactive. If exclusionPolicy is set to ExclusionOptional the group is exclusive but the active checkable action in the group can be unchecked leaving the group with no actions checked.

If exclusive is true, only one checkable action in the action group can ever be active at any time. If the user chooses another checkable action in the group, the one they chose becomes active and the one that was active becomes inactive.

If it is known that many items will have children, reimplementing hasChildren() to unconditionally return true is sometimes a useful approach to take. This ensures that each item can be later examined for children while making initial population of model data as fast as possible. The only disadvantage is that items without children may be displayed incorrectly in some views until the user attempts to view the non-existent child items.
trans-unit.target: 如果知道许多项目将有孩子，那么重新实现hasChildren（）以无条件返回 true 有时是一种有用的方法。这样可以确保以后可以检查每个项目的儿童，同时尽可能快地对模型数据进行初始填充。唯一的缺点是，在用户尝试查看不存在的子项之前，没有子项的项可能会在某些视图中显示不正确。

trans-unit.source: If it's the first time the static text is drawn, or if the static text, or the painter's font has been altered since the last time it was drawn, the text's layout has to be recalculated. On some paint engines, changing the matrix of the painter will also cause the layout to be recalculated. In particular, this will happen for any engine except for the OpenGL2 paint engine. Recalculating the layout will impose an overhead on the QPainter::drawStaticText() call where it occurs. To avoid this overhead in the paint event, you can call prepare() ahead of time to ensure that the layout is calculated.

If no audio plugins are available, a fallback dummy backend will be used. This should print out warnings if this is the case when you try and use QAudioInput or QAudioOutput.
